c74object.name: rbiquad~
c74object.description: rbiquad~ is a biquad filter that accepts only signal rate coefficients. The memory can be cleared on a sample-accurate basis, using a dedicated reset input. In granular applications with filtering per voice this allows correct reset of the filter before each new grain.

method.name: First-inlet
method.digest: The audio input to be filtered
method.description: The first inlet takes an audio signal to be filtered.

method.name: Second-inlet
method.description: The second inlet takes the 0th feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).

method.name: Third-inlet
method.description: The third inlet takes the 1st feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).

method.name: Fourth-inlet
method.description: The fourth inlet takes the 2nd feedforward coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).

method.name: Fifth-inlet
method.description: The fifth inlet takes the 1st feedback coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).

method.name: Sixth-inlet
method.description: The sixth inlet takes the 2nd feedback coefficient (this can be generated using filtercoeff~).

method.name: Seventh-inlet
method.description: The seventh inlet takes a trigger signal used to clear the filters memory. In granular applications with filtering per voice this allows correct reset of the filter before each new grain.
